thread.title: Kortney Hause hails Wolves' youth policy
thread.title_full: Kortney Hause hails Wolves' youth policy

title: Kortney Hause hails Wolves' youth policy
text:
Wolves' Ebanks-Landell faces months out 
“But I watch a lot of Premier League football and even the very best defenders in that league make mistakes from time to time. 
“John Terry is a great defender who has made over 500 appearances in the Premier League and all those appearances for England, but he will still make a mistake. 
“It’s more about what happens after you make a mistake, and the one thing I would say about Terry is that he will never crumble or go under.” 
On a possible second cap for England Under-21s against Kazakhstan in the European Championship qualifiers tomorrow, Hause is not ready to sit around and admire the position he is in. 
He said: “I played in the friendly against the USA, which was my first game for the under-21s having played a lot for the under-20s. What do you think? Log in and start commenting 
“I think it is a good achievement to be in that squad but the next target is to play in a qualifier. Hopefully, I will do it. 
“Again, though, just being around some quality players like that in training can only help and I can continue to learn and progress.” Receive daily email updates from the Express & Star
